PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-01492013-02-14,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Broadcasting Corporation ** Purchase Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION (as vendor) enter into an asset purchase AGREEMENT with BLUE ANT MEDIA INC. (as purchaser) and into an assignment and assumption AGREEMENT (in which Blue Ant Media Inc. will assign its rights to BLUE ANT MEDIA PARTNERSHIP) to dispose of programming undertaking known as "bold".
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Canadian Broadcasting Corporation  ** Purchase Agreement **
precis: Order approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION (as vendor) enter into an asset purchase AGREEMENT with BLUE ANT MEDIA INC. (as purchaser) and into an assignment and assumption AGREEMENT (in which Blue Ant Media Inc. will assign its rights to BLUE ANT MEDIA PARTNERSHIP) to dispose of programming undertaking known as "bold".
